mapper.insert: insert into t_user_problem_solved ( username, problem_id, try_count, solved_count, last_try_time, first_solved_time ) values ( #{userProblemSolvedPO.username}, #{userProblemSolvedPO.problemId}, #{userProblemSolvedPO.tryCount}, #{userProblemSolvedPO.solvedCount}, #{userProblemSolvedPO.lastTryTime}, #{userProblemSolvedPO.firstSolvedTime} );
mapper.select: SELECT username, problem_type type, COUNT(problem_type) score FROM t_user_problem_solved ups, t_problem_difficult pd WHERE ups.problem_id = pd.problem_id AND solved_count > 0 AND username=#{username} GROUP BY problem_type;
